description: The accused is remanded in custody in the case of Victoria Hall, who vanished after a night out.
title: Man in court over death of Victoria Hall in 1999
title_page: Man in court over death of Victoria Hall in 1999 - BBC News
maintext:
A man accused of kidnap and murder over the death of a teenager 26 years ago has appeared at the Old Bailey.
Victoria Hall, 17, from Trimley St Mary in Suffolk, vanished after a night out with a friend at Bandbox nightclub in Felixstowe in September 1999.
Steve Wright, 66, formerly of London Road, Ipswich, already pleaded not guilty to kidnap and murder at a previous court hearing.
On Wednesday, he was remanded in custody pending a trial fixed for 2 February 2026 at the Old Bailey.
